title: Prepare for Marketplace
description: Learn to prepare your plugin for the Claude Code marketplace. Publishing shares your tools with the community.

initialFiles.content:
# Challenge: Prepare for Marketplace

Prepare your plugin for publishing to a Claude Code marketplace.

## Objectives
1. Ensure plugin.json has all required marketplace fields
2. Add a comprehensive README.md for users
3. Add a LICENSE file
4. Create a CHANGELOG.md
5. Verify the plugin structure is complete

---
name: hello
description: A friendly greeting skill
user-invocable: true
---

Greet the user warmly and offer to help them with their coding tasks.

bonusObjectives.description: CHANGELOG follows Keep a Changelog format

hints.text: Marketplace plugins need complete metadata, documentation, and licensing.
Try: 'Prepare this plugin for marketplace: add author info, repository URL, comprehensive README, LICENSE, and CHANGELOG'

Ask: 'Make this plugin marketplace-ready: 1) Update plugin.json with author object, repository URL, and keywords 2) Rewrite README.md with Installation, Usage, Features, and Contributing sections 3) Add MIT LICENSE file 4) Create CHANGELOG.md following Keep a Changelog format'

solution.approach: Complete all marketplace requirements: metadata, documentation, licensing, and changelog.
solution.example: Prepare the plugin for marketplace with full metadata, README, LICENSE, and CHANGELOG
alternativeApproaches: Make the plugin ready for publishing
Add all the files needed to share this plugin publicly

learningPoints: Marketplace plugins need complete plugin.json metadata
Good documentation helps users understand and adopt your plugin
Licensing clarifies how others can use your code
